name: Failure to adequately verify, deliver, or supply Hawaii products
text: [§103D-1002.5]  Failure to adequately verify, deliver, or supply Hawaii products.  If the administrator or procurement officer who has awarded a contract under section 103D-1002, finds that in the performance of that contract there has been a failure to comply with section 103D-1002, the contract shall be voidable and the findings shall be referred for debarment or suspension proceedings under section 103D-702. [L 2009, c 175, §4]
